A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm amending this to 1 star as I hear 1/2 stars don't count.  I guess the 1 Star can be for John Williams\, the only part of this crap-fest that didn't totally suck.\n\nI can't even bring myself to write the review this steaming pile deserves.  My 40 year love of Star Wars has been sharted on.  Any true fan\, anyone who loves Luke Skywalker\, I implore you to walk away\, run away\, this WILL ruin it all.  Rian Buttface Johnson has burned the world of Star Wars\, that you love\, to the ground.  Eat a pile of poop Rian.
